column4: Bacjup: dd -if /dev/hda1 > partitionimage.dd how can I get back those data, after I screw something up??
if I backup my partition on which is linux, by this command dd -if /dev/hda1 > partitionimage.dd they are backed up, but if something goes wrong how can I get those data?!?
but If I wont be able to come into linux...
whats the name of the program and how can I get it..
